alert.note: Alert for Richland (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 30 at 4:52PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Richland County through 515 PM CDT... At 452 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Spring Green, or 13 miles southeast of Richland Center, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Richland County, including the following locations... Keyesville, Highway 130 And Count B, Gotham, Bear Valley and Lone Rock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
